name: map-service-connection
description: Maps a generic service connection to environment variables.
helpMarkDown: Maps a generic service connection to environment variables.
author: Hemisphera

inputs.name: serviceConnection
inputs.label: Service Connection
inputs.helpMarkDown: Provide the service connection to be mapped.

inputs.name: prefix
inputs.label: Prefix
inputs.helpMarkDown: The prefix for the variables that the service connection will be mapped to.
